description:
Someone set up an elaborate Go-based murder scene in just 5 minutes, but everyone has an alibi? Kindaichi finds the clues to break one alibi and nab the killer!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chidamari no Ma Satsujin Jiken File. 2
L`affaire du meurtre de la salle de la mare de sang, dossier 2
The Blood Pool Hall Murder, File 2
血溜之間殺人事件 File.2
